title: Stream: W∆NR – Cityscape EP
content:
Oregon duo W∆NR impressed with their debut track, the slick, R&B influenced jam Can’t Get Money, and have now returned with their full debut EP, titled Cityscapes.

More indie-pop orientated than their initial outing would indicate, it’s a subtly brilliant listen, from the Washed Out-esque vibes of the title track to the tribal percussion led rumble of Barriers. Whilst numerous artist appear able to impress blogs with their premiere releases, its takes more than that to build any form of career out of it, and on this EP W∆NR show that they have more than enough about them to create a level of sustainability. Check out the full EP below, especially the soulful standout track The Finest Things feat. back-up vocals from Ana Marcu, then download it on a name your price deal. Oh, and tell a friend.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
